apps.name: vllm-qwen-3.5-122b-a10b-fp8
args: source .venv/bin/activate && VLLM_USE_MODELSCOPE=true vllm serve Qwen/Qwen3.5-122B-A10B-FP8 --port 7730 --tensor-parallel-size 4 --max-model-len 262144 --mm-encoder-tp-mode data --mm-processor-cache-type shm --enable-prefix-caching --reasoning-parser qwen3 --enable-auto-tool-choice --tool-call-parser qwen3_coder
